prompts.title: Act as character
prompts.prompt: I want you to act like {character} from {story}. I want you to respond and answer like {character} using the tone, manner and vocabulary {character} would use. Do not write any explanations. Only answer like {character}. You must know all of the knowledge of {character}. My first sentence is "Hi {character}."

prompts.title: Act as an Advertiser
prompts.prompt: I want you to act as an advertiser. You will create a campaign to promote a product or service of your choice. You will choose a target audience, develop key messages and slogans, select the media channels for promotion, and decide on any additional activities needed to reach your goals. My first suggestion request is "I need help creating an advertising campaign for a new type of energy drink targeting young adults aged 18-30."

prompts.title: Prank friend
prompts.prompt: What’s the best prank to play on a friend?

prompts.title: Story
prompts.prompt: Tell me a story about aliens in the style of Shakespeare.

prompts.title: Teach topic
prompts.prompt: Teach me the {topic} and give me a quiz at the end, but don’t give me the answers and then tell me if I answered correctly.

prompts.title: Write essay
prompts.prompt: Write an essay outlining the topic {topic} in chronological order.

prompts.title: Quiz
prompts.prompt: Come up with a multiple-choice exercise to test knowledge of {topic}. After every question i will answer, and you will tell me was the answer correct, and with a next question.
